Header: 54 Division GOC Visits Formations Under Command to the HQ
Content: The General Officer Commanding (GOC), 54 Division, Major General D. S. D Welikala made formal visits to the 543, 573 Brigades and their under command battalions during 29-30 January. The visiting GOC was greeted to separate Guard Turnouts at those Brigades and presented with briefings about the role and tasks of each Brigade and respective formation during the visits. The visiting GOC was also invited to plant a few saplings in those camp premises during his stay at those places.
